Title: Forestry construction of New China
Designer: Chinese National Science Popularization Association (中华全国科学技术普及协会)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: A 5-poster series, outlining developments in forestry since 1949.Entitled "Vigorous afforestation" (大力造林), it shows various localities where afforestation is underway. This includes the Western part of the Northeast; wasteland reclamation; closing mountains for afforestation; and tree planting.
